A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie sucked completely.  I already saw the battle on ice planet Hoth and the O.J. Simpson slow speed chase.  I wanted to like the movie but am past the point of pretending a movie was good when it really was lousy out of a sense of loyalty to a particular franchise.  I am advising everyone I know that hasn't seen it yet to wait until it is on ABC so that they do not have to waste their money.  I am a lifelong Star Wars fan since the beginning\, but this was a piece of crap.  I gave it 1/2 star for the fight sequence in Snokes throne room.
